translation: Prowess, splendor, firmness, dexterity, and not fleeing from battle, generosity, and lordliness are the duties of the Kshatriyas, born of their own nature.
commentary: 18.43 Valor prowess? Tejah splendour? Worn firmness? dexterity dexterity? in battle in battle? f and? Even also? not fleeing not fleeing? Charity generosity? Godliness lordliness? f and? Kshatriyas of Kshatriyas? Karma action? Svabhavajam born of nature.Commentary It is the first duty of a Kshatriya (man of the warrior class or of royal blood) to be brave and chivalrous.
